name: Slide Art Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
Embark on a fun and cerebral journey through a gallery of puzzles gathering the most beautiful paintings in the history of art

Solve hundred of jigsaw puzzles of famous painters masterpieces specially tailored to entertain you.

——— A SIMPLE, INTUITIVE AND CULTURAL GAME ———

The rules are simple: you have to recreate each painting broken down into pieces.
Slide every pieces at the right places and the original masterpiece will magically appear !
But don’t overpass the number of moves allowed.
Otherwise you will have to start it all over again !

Once you get each picture completed, the next one is unlocked. And the journey continue through the paintings masterpieces of the history of art. From Da Vinci to Kandinsky.

——— GREAT FOR BREAKS! ———

With more than 200 beautifull paintings, Slide Art provide numerous level of difficulties specially tailored for any kind of puzzle fan.
Great for coffee break, train journey, or even in boring meetings!
